snippet: The Brooklyn Art Library houses the ongoing Sketchbook Project, an endeavor that has amassed some 12,500 sketchbooks made by people from more than 130 countries.
abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on the Brooklyn Art Library, space in Williamsburg, Brooklyn, that houses the Sketchbook Project, collection of sketchbooks created by professional or would-be artists to document their lives.
lead_paragraph: The Brooklyn Art Library houses the ongoing Sketchbook Project, an endeavor that has amassed some 12,500 sketchbooks made by people from more than 130 countries.

headline.print_headline: A Home For Sketchbooks Of the World
headline.seo: At the Brooklyn Art Library, a Home for Personal Sketchbooks
headline.main: A Home for Sketchbooks of the World
